BR_text.BRsummary: Unexpected libpng error when resizing PNG images
BR_text.BRdescription:
Some PNG images will load and allow inspection, but when you try to resize them, an error occurs:
 >>> img = tc.Image('bike_261.image.png')
 >>> img.pixel_data
 # Works, shows the right numpy array
 >>> tc.image_analysis.resize(img, img.width, img.height, img.channels, decode=False)
 # Works, no-op
 >>> tc.image_analysis.resize(img, img.width, img.height, img.channels, decode=True)
 turicreate.toolkits._main.ToolkitError: Unexpected libpng error
 >>> tc.image_analysis.resize(img, 100, 100)
 turicreate.toolkits._main.ToolkitError: Unexpected libpng error
 An image that triggers this can be found <denchmark-link:https://lear.inrialpes.fr/people/marszalek/data/ig02/>here</denchmark-link>
  (the image in the example is from the bikes zip file)
